Content.En: Hey, it seems like Snowy hasn't appeared on campus recently.
I don't know how it's been lately?
The last time I saw it was in the garden,
Content.Cn: 不知道它最近怎么样了

Content.En: but its movements seemed quite unusual,
Content.Cn: 前一次看到它的时候，还是在花园那边

Content.En: often bringing food back to its small nest in the garden.
Content.Cn: 但是它的动作好像很不对劲

Content.En: I can't find it now and I'm worried about it.
Content.Cn: 经常带食物回去花园小窝

Content.En: Can you help me check what happened?
Content.Cn: 我现在找不到它了，比较担心它
